thread.title: The mini formo formo Xming Episode One is € 199 instead of € 250
thread.title_full: The mini formo formo Xming Episode One is € 199 instead of € 250

author: Kyra Kyra
title: The mini formo formo Xming Episode One is € 199 instead of € 250
text:
An exceptional image quality for the pleasure of your eyes
The main asset of formo Xming Episode One is its ability to project images in Full HD (1080p), offering a good level of detail, even on a large diagonal (up to 120 inches). With a brightness of 150 ISO Lumens, it is particularly effective in weakly lit environments, creating a perfect atmosphere for viewing films. Although the brightness is contained, limiting its use during the day, use in the darkness fully reveals the potential of this projector. In the end, these characteristics make the Xming Episode One an attractive option for moviegoers in search of quality visual performance at an affordable price.
